Description: Moulded pottery shabti of Tjanefer with painted detail: a black lappet-wig, a red face with black eyes and red crossed arms; the front of the leg section is inscribed with black painted hieroglyphs within a black border, the back is unshaped, the foot section has broken away.
Curator's comments: In set with .9485 In set with .9486
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Somerset Lowry-Corry, 2nd Earl of Belmore
